title: Bimetallic Co–Mn catalysts for synergistic enhancement of VOC gas-sensing performance of ZnO hierarchical nanostructures
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10358-10369

The synergistic effect between bonding dissimilar metals is a very effective way to improve the performance of metal catalysts.
